amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to direct the Director of BOP to develop tools to communicate parenting program availability and eligibility criteria to each BOP employee and each pregnant inmate to ensure that each pregnant inmate understands the resources available to them.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Meng.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
